extendedInfo.description: Letâs Talk! (Parliamo! in Italian) is a set of cards aimed at turning the conversation ON between two people, alone or in company, to start talking as a family again..Each card displays a question to think about or ask the other, to get to know each other better, discover the otherâs point of view and talk about issues that matter to life as a couple.- 274 questions- 3 levels of depth and intimacy- random questions generator- list of all the questions- information and procedures- creation of your own questions- send your questions to the editors (the best will be integrated into the app)- regular updatesTwo people in love are talking to each other.The âLet's talk!â Cards have been created to provide new stimuli to dialogue as a couple.
